references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational latent diffusion model, a core technology upon which many subsequent text-to-image models are built.

references.paper_title: SDXL: Improving latent diffusion models for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper significantly improves upon the original latent diffusion model, leading to higher-quality image generation.

references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel architecture that enhances high-resolution image generation capabilities.

references.paper_title: Pixart-alpha: Fast training of diffusion transformer for photorealistic text-to-image synthesis
references.reason: This paper proposes a fast training method for diffusion transformers leading to more efficient text-to-image generation.

references.paper_title: Pixart-sigma: Weak-to-strong training of diffusion transformer for 4k text-to-image generation
references.reason: This paper further improves the training of diffusion transformers achieving superior 4k image generation quality.
